name: Maple Ave
description: A serene stretch of Maple Avenue, where a gentle breeze rustles the leaves. You are on Maple Ave. A gentle breeze rustles the leaves of the maple trees that give this street its name, a fleeting moment of natural beauty in the otherwise mundane suburban landscape. Maple Ave continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and a few houses that have seen better decades. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird, oblivious to the subtle decay.
